name: aim-trainer
description: This game used to be a minor task during one of my first weeks studying at Get Academy. The original instructions were: "to have a view() function that draw 5x5 circles, and one "lamp" will light up and have an onclick function that calls the view() function and renders a new random lamp that lights up, etc etc. Then try to add a timer that can show the user how much time it took before the right lamp was clicked."
